creator: yjchae@onmaru.com
text:
Hello.

This is YoungJin Chae.

I'm korean and can speak little English.

I'm using httpd-2.0.58 and mod_cband.

Follow Configuraion
-------------------------------------------------------
<Location /cband-status>
SetHandler cband-status
</Location>
<Location /throttle-me>
SetHandler cband-status-me
</Location>
-------------------------------------------------------
This configuration seems to very well running.
(Like, http://222.239.76.172/cband-status)

But, received ErrorPage on this URL (http://news.maruinternet.com/cband-status).

This URL has "RewriteEngine On" in .htaccess file.

This configuration has no error in Apache 1.3.

Because, httpd.conf has high prority than .htaccess file any directories.

But, Apache 2.0 changed.

Solve my problem.

Thank you.

Sorry but this seems to be a problem with mod_cband which is a 3rd party module.
Keep in mind that due to API changes mod_cband for 1.3 and mod_cband for 2.0
must have significant differences. Please try to obtain further help at
http://mod-cband.com/.
creator: rpluem@apache.org
